featured.text: Now it’s very calm and quiet here.
Before John got on the stage to give the speech, he took a deep ________ to calm himself down.

definition.zh_def: 平靜的，安靜的，沒有激動或焦慮的狀態。
definition.en_def: Free from excitement or agitation; peaceful and quiet.
definition.example: She took a deep breath to remain calm during the stressful situation.
